name: Personalized Engagement Ring Platter with Ring Box | Floral Ring Platter
description:
Shop Exquisite Personalized Engagement Ring Platter with Ring Box - Buy Floral Ring Platter Online in India for Unforgettable Moments
 
POV: You are about to get engaged and looking for a beautiful engagement ring platter. Introducing luxurious Engagement Ring Tray / Engagement Ring Platter with floral decorations and classic glass box with ring holder. Ready to use Ring platter comes with attached box.

Tray Size: 11.5 inches.
Personalize the Box with Bride and Groom's Initials
Personalize the tray with Bride and Groom's Names.
The best part is that you can use the box later as storage box to keep your accessories, jewellery etc.
Current Order processing time is 2-3 Business Days, Typical Shipping time: 4-6 Business Days

Get ready to embark on a truly special engagement journey with our luxurious Engagement Ring Tray and Platter. Picture this: You're about to propose, and you want everything to be perfect, including the ring presentation. That's where our exquisite Engagement Ring Platter comes in. Designed with impeccable craftsmanship, it features enchanting floral decorations that add a touch of elegance to your special moment.
But that's not all! Our Engagement Ring Platter comes complete with a classic glass box that includes a dedicated ring holder. This means you don't have to worry about separate arrangements for the ring—it's all conveniently taken care of. Our ready-to-use Ring Platter with attached box ensures a seamless and breathtaking presentation that will leave your partner speechless.
Make your engagement an unforgettable experience with our stunning Engagement Ring Tray and Platter. Let the beauty of our floral decorations and the convenience of the attached ring box enhance this significant milestone in your love story. Explore our collection now and create a magical moment that will be cherished forever.
*Note: The flower design and color may vary depending on availability

name: Personalized Candy theme Cake Topper – Custom Name & Age Birthday Decoration PKCT126
description:
Personalized Candy theme Cake Topper – Custom Name & Age Birthday Decoration
Get your child thrilled when they will have their favorite characters customized in cake topper only for them.
Enhance your birthday celebration with our Personalized Candy theme Cake Topper! Made with high-quality material, this topper adds a touch of custom charm to your cake. Featuring candyland theme, it's perfect for all ages. Make your child's birthday extra special with this unique decoration.
 

The size of toppers ranges between 5 - 6.5 inches wide depending on the design.
Each topper comes with one or two 2.5 inches long bottom sticks for easy insertion into cake.
Turnaround time is 1-3 Working days and general shipping time is 3-6 Working Days depending on where you live.
Please refer to Shipping Policy, Return Policy for more information.

 
 The designer has the freedom to make minor alterations to the design if required.
